articles.author: CBS
articles.title: Pink Moon glows in the night sky - WANE
articles.description: The celestial phenomenon is called a pink moon as it appears in April and is named after an American plant, pink phlox, that blooms in spring.
articles.content:
(CBS) – A glowing pink moon could be seen from the sky in some areas Saturday night, just in time for Easter.
The celestial phenomenon is called a pink moon as it appears in April and is named after… [+166 chars]

articles.title: Meet Indian-origin American Raja Chari who will soon return from space - The Federal
articles.description: Indian-origin astronaut Raja Chari will return to Earth from the International Space Station (ISS) later his month. The 44-year-old is the commander of the NASA SpaceX Crew-3 mission to the ISS.
articles.content:
Indian-origin astronaut Raja Chari will return to Earth from the International Space Station (ISS) later his month. The 44-year-old is the commander of the NASA SpaceX Crew-3 mission to the ISS.
